name: HYPERFIGHT (hypersnow)
description:
Note for HTML5 version: Audio has been disabled by default due to issues with laggy or missing sounds, turn on at your own discretion. Additionally, all unlocks are available by default as some browsers have issues with save data. Please use Google Chrome or download the desktop version for the best experience! Or, try the Steam version with online multiplayer!

HYPERFIGHT is a fighting game where every hit is lethal, and every win counts. You'll have to risk your points to gain access to your character's special and super moves, which can turn the tide of the game in a heartbeat. Designed to be easy to pick up and hard to master, so grab a friend, any friend (or multiple)!

Featuring:

  • 5 (+1 unlockable) characters to master, with unique movesets
  • Online multiplayer lobbies and matchmaking (Steam version only)
  • Local VS mode, against players and CPU opponents
  • Single player arcade mode and tutorial
  • Full controller support, with rebindable controls

Patch Notes

(9/16/19) v2.0.2

  • Made Steam/HTML5 popups dismissable using the Start button

(9/14/19) v2.0.1

  • Adjusted delay for Quick Match to be higher overall

(9/14/19) v2.0 "Unlimited"

  • Renamed to simply HYPERFIGHT (v1.x codenamed "Max Battle")
  • Added online matchmaking and friend lobbies (up to 2 players for now)
  • New character: Vince Volt
  • New stage + music: Sunset Bridge
  • Major UI rehaul
  • New moves for Shoto Goto, Dark Goto, and Don McRon
  • Rebalanced physics and all characters
  • Move lists in pause menu
  • CPU vs CPU mode
  • CPU difficulty option (Normal by default)
  • Vsync option (On by default)
  • Fixed GLES3 graphics issue when opening game on some computers
  • Fixed Mac fullscreen bug
  • Double KOs now work as intended

(3/4/19) v1.1 "Max Battle"

  • Fixed an issue where computers without vsync would run the game at higher than 60fps
